sent.orig: The inner truth is hidden--luckily, luckily.
sent.trans: 这内含的真理是藏在其中的，这倒是万幸；这倒是万幸。

sent.orig: Love is not all luckily, all are not the love luckily.
sent.trans: 幸好爱情不是一切，幸好一切都不是爱情。

sent.orig: Luckily for me I managed to steer clear of such events.
sent.trans: 幸运的是，我成功避开了这些事件。

sent.orig: He fell off the motorcar. Luckily, he wasn't badly hurt.
sent.trans: 他从摩托车上摔下来，幸运地是，他伤得不重。

sent.orig: Jim: Luckily, there are lots of who like to feed these ducks and geese even Sally.
sent.trans: 吉姆：非常幸运，许多人喜欢喂这些鸭子和鹅——包括萨莉。
